properties.description: We are particularly hoping to support people who are feeling lonely and disconnected, to expand their connection with our lovely city community by offering sessions where they can develop friendships and take part in simple activities including meditative arts and crafts. No prior experience is required, these are skill-share sessions for us all to learn something simple, or to refresh and develop existing skills. Our aim is to offer our community the chance to forge new links, learn something new and maybe pick up hobbies and activities to take home with them. This is an ideal way to make new friends and we are happy to hold this weekly space for our community.
properties.title: Mandala Yoga and Well-being

properties.description: Tuesday: Coffestop@TCF 11.00am to 1.30pm- Hot drink and toast served at 11.00am. Light lunched served at 12 noon. Have a chat, do a jigsaw, play dominoes, make new friends, or just relax. Need help? We are ready to listen. Chattabox on Thursday is for parents/carers and pre school children. 10.00am to 11.30am. Craft, singing, meet other families. Small charge of £1 for 1 adult and 2 children. Extra people 50p per person. This includes a drink and biscuits for all Sunday morning service, 10.30am to 12 noon. All ages are welcome. No charge
properties.title: Tanterton Christian Centre

properties.address: Penny Street, Blackburn, Lancashire BB1 6HQ BB1 6HQ
properties.description: We cater for all ages. Everyone is welcome. We are a community arts centre, just a short distance from the bus station. You can find us opposite the job centre on Penny Street. We have two sessions a week, both of which are free and friendly and where you can get a brew, toast and a chat.
properties.title: The Bureau Centre for the Arts

properties.description: A warm welcome every Wednesday 10.15-1pm with lunches and coffee mornings on alternate weeks

properties.description: An Energy Hub that has a community room along with a kids table where they can play some games on the available tablets or do some colouring in. We serve hot drinks and run Energy Efficiency workshops, to show how you can save money on your household bills.
properties.title: Utilita Energy Hub (Blackburn)

properties.address: west preston methodist church Ingol, Lancashire PR2 3XA
properties.description: Come join us for our activities open to all people. On Tuesday we have our Thrift Shop 10-3pm a place to meet friends and talk at our cafe or peruse our second hand shop. On Tuesday Evenings 7.30-9pm we have Bible study with tea and biscuits open to all. On Thursday Mornings we have handy fellowship 10-1 with some simple building maintenance with lots of tea and coffee breaks! On Friday is our Friday Friends group 11am-2pm with games chatter and company we would love to see you there at any of our activities
properties.title: West Preston Methodist Church Ingol
